title: Multi-Factor Authentication for Secure Login
description: As a user, I want to log in using multi-factor authentication, so that my account remains secure.
acceptance_criteria: Given user enters correct credentials, When second factor is verified, Then user logs in successfully
test_cases: Given user enters correct credentials, When second factor is verified, Then user logs in successfully

title: Role-Based Access Control Implementation
description: As an admin, I want to assign role-based permissions, so that users can access only relevant features.
acceptance_criteria: Given user has specific role, When accessing the application, Then only relevant features are accessible
test_cases: Given user has specific role, When accessing the application, Then only relevant features are accessible

title: Personalized Dashboard Display
description: As a customer, I want my dashboard to display relevant banking products and insights, so that I see information tailored to me.
acceptance_criteria: Given user profile, When accessing the dashboard, Then personalized content is displayed
test_cases: Given user profile, When accessing the dashboard, Then personalized content is displayed

title: Quick Navigation to Frequently Used Features
description: As a customer, I want to quickly navigate to frequently used features, so that I spend less time finding what I need.
acceptance_criteria: Given frequently used features defined, When user accesses dashboard, Then quick navigation links are available
test_cases: Given frequently used features defined, When user accesses dashboard, Then quick navigation links are available

epic_title: Digital Account Opening and Service Workflows
title: Digital Account Opening Workflow
description: As a potential customer, I want to open a new account online, so that I can start using services without visiting the branch.
acceptance_criteria: Given user starts account opening, When step-by-step followed, Then account is opened successfully
test_cases: Given user starts account opening, When step-by-step followed, Then account is opened successfully

epic_title: Digital Account Opening and Service Workflows
title: Service Modification Requests
description: As an existing customer, I want to modify my services online, so that I can manage my account settings conveniently.
acceptance_criteria: Given user initiates modification request, When real-time validations are met, Then services are modified successfully
test_cases: Given user initiates modification request, When real-time validations are met, Then services are modified successfully

title: Real-Time Status Tracking
description: As a customer, I want to track my requests in real-time, so that I am aware of the progress.
acceptance_criteria: Given active requests, When tracking interface accessed, Then real-time updates are visible
test_cases: Given active requests, When tracking interface accessed, Then real-time updates are visible

title: Smart Notifications
description: As a customer, I want to receive notifications about my request status, so that I stay informed without manual checking.
acceptance_criteria: Given user's request status changes, When notification sent, Then user receives alert
test_cases: Given user's request status changes, When notification sent, Then user receives alert

epic_title: Draft Saving and Document Upload Functionality
title: Draft Saving for Applications
description: As a customer, I want to save my application draft, so that I can resume it later without losing data.
acceptance_criteria: Given user starts application, When saving draft, Then data is preserved securely
test_cases: Given user starts application, When saving draft, Then data is preserved securely

epic_title: Draft Saving and Document Upload Functionality
title: Document Upload and Management
description: As a customer, I want to upload documents securely, so that my applications include necessary documentation.
acceptance_criteria: Given mandatory documents, When uploading them, Then documents are saved securely
test_cases: Given mandatory documents, When uploading them, Then documents are saved securely

title: Real-Time Core Banking Integration
description: As a customer, I want real-time data synchronization with the core banking system, so that my transactions are accurate.
acceptance_criteria: Given user performs transaction, When data synchronized, Then core banking system updates accurately
test_cases: Given user performs transaction, When data synchronized, Then core banking system updates accurately

title: Secure Interaction History
description: As a customer, I want my interaction history to be securely maintained, so that I can review past transactions and requests.
acceptance_criteria: Given past interactions, When accessing history, Then detailed records are visible securely
test_cases: Given past interactions, When accessing history, Then detailed records are visible securely

title: Responsive Design for Multi-Device Access
description: As a user, I want a consistent interface across devices, so that I have an optimal experience on any screen.
acceptance_criteria: Given different devices, When accessing portal, Then interface is consistently responsive
test_cases: Given different devices, When accessing portal, Then interface is consistently responsive

title: Cross-Browser Compatibility
description: As a user, I want cross-browser compatibility, so that I can access the portal using any web browser.
acceptance_criteria: Given various browsers, When accessing the portal, Then it works consistently across all
test_cases: Given various browsers, When accessing the portal, Then it works consistently across all
